Name: ADNI (Alzheimer's Disease Neuro-Imaging Initiative)
Description: Image, clinical, and genetic data for Alzheimer's disease

Name: Texas Hospital Inpatient Discharge Public
Description: The Public Use Data File contains data on discharges from Texas hospitals. Data are available by quarter beginning with data for 1999. The scheduled release dates for 2010 data are: First Quarter - March 2011, Second Quarter - June 2011, Third Quarter - September 2011 and Fourth Quarter - December 2011. The Texas Public Use Data File (PUDF) has been released through forth quarter 2009. Purchasing the PUDF requires a completed Order Form and a signed Data Use Agreement.
Availability: Old years are free; New years available on request

Name: The Dartmouth Atlas of Health Care
Description: Medicare data that contains information and analysis about national, regional and local markets, as well as hospitals and their affiliated physicians.

Name: Data Sources from Second Workshop on Data Mining for Health care Management (DMHM 2011)
Description: Data sets used for the papers in this workshop

Name: NIH Data Sets
Description: A large collection of data sets on various aspects of health care hosted by the NIH

Name: Drug and Substance Abuse Data Sets
Description: Various data sets related to drug and substance abuse studies

Name: Agency for Health care Research and Quality
Description: Contains a list of data sources on the following topics---accessibility of care, ambulatory surgeries, emergency department visits, health care disparities, health care provided to low-income and other vulnerable populations, health care quality, health care spending, health care use, health information data element definitions, values and information models, HIV/AIDS, hospitalizations, by payer, by states, for children and state specific health care quality information (strengths, weaknesses and opportunities for improvement)

Name: Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS)
Description: Health care survey data from 1984-2009-contains both summary statistics and raw data

Name: Framingham Health Care Data Set
Description: Identifies the common factors that contribute to cardiovascular disease by following its development over a long period of time in a large group of participants.

Name: Laboratory for Neuro-Imaging (UCLA)
Description: The Image Data Archive houses data for dozens of medical imaging projects, from small, single institution studies to large multi-site consortia efforts.
Availability: Data for certain projects free and available on request

Name: Heritage Health care Prize
Description: Heritage launched the $3 million Heritage Health Prize with one goal in mind: to develop a breakthrough algorithm that uses available patient data, including health records and claims data, to predict and prevent unnecessary hospitalizations.

Name: Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS)
Description: Health care survey data from 1984-2009; contains both summary statistics and raw data

Name: Stanford Micro-Array Database
Description: Can access data for a particular species

Name: Stanford Genomic Resources
Description: Genome data available for different diseases

Name: World Bank Health Care Data Sets
